alert.note: Alert for Stephenson (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS QuadCities (Eastern Iowa and Northwestern Illinois - Quad Cities)
info.headline: Flood Watch issued March 02 at 3:51AM CST until March 06 at 8:00AM CST by NWS QuadCities
info.description: ...The Flood Watch continues for the following rivers in Iowa... Illinois... Iowa River at Marengo affecting Iowa and Benton Counties. Iowa River at Wapello affecting Louisa County. Pecatonica River at Freeport affecting Stephenson County. ...FLOOD WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM SATURDAY AFTERNOON TO MONDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Flooding is possible. * WHERE...Pecatonica River at Freeport. * WHEN...From Saturday afternoon to Monday morning. * IMPACTS...At 13.0 feet, Flood Stage. Water affects low lying sections of Freeport mainly east of the Pecatonica River. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 3:30 AM CST Thursday the stage was 12.7 feet. - Forecast...Flood stage may be reached early Saturday afternoon. - Flood stage is 13.0 feet. &&
info.instruction: Residents and those with interests near the river should monitor rising water levels and be prepared for possible flood warnings. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/quadcities. The next statement will be issued late this morning.
